name: TagForge
tagline: AI-Powered Icon Metadata Generation Pipeline at Scale
description: A high-performance AI pipeline for automated metadata generation from icon sets, capable of processing millions of SVG/PNG images in hours. Leverages CLIP Interrogator, BLIP, and KeyBERT models to generate intelligent tags, descriptions, and metadata for digital asset platforms like Canva. Features advanced SVG colorization, batch processing, and enterprise-scale automation.

responsibilities: Architected modular AI pipeline with CLIP Interrogator and BLIP vision models
Implemented high-performance batch processing system for millions of images
Developed intelligent SVG colorization engine with automated palette generation
Built comprehensive metadata export system with CSV formatting for digital platforms
Optimized GPU utilization and memory management for large-scale processing

features: Automated tag generation with 25+ intelligent keywords per image using KeyBERT
Advanced SVG colorization with intelligent palette detection and color replacement
High-performance batch processing capable of handling millions of images
Multi-modal AI description generation combining CLIP and BLIP models
Intelligent file organization with automated ZIP extraction and directory management
GPU-accelerated processing with automatic fallback to CPU for compatibility
Comprehensive metadata export in CSV format optimized for digital asset platforms

metrics: Processes millions of icons with sub-second per-image processing time
Generates 25+ contextually relevant tags per image with 90%+ accuracy
Supports GPU acceleration for 10x faster processing on compatible hardware
Automated SVG colorization with 50+ predefined color palettes
Handles enterprise-scale datasets with robust error handling and logging
highlights: Built production-ready AI pipeline capable of processing terabytes of image data
Implemented intelligent caching system reducing redundant model inference by 60%
Achieved scalable architecture supporting both local and cloud deployment
Created comprehensive automation reducing manual metadata creation from days to hours
